thread.section_title: Zicasso Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zicasso | www.zicasso.com
thread.title: Victor S

author: Victor S
title: Victor S
text: Zicasso came through for me and my newly wed wife for our honeymoon to Greece. We wanted our honeymoon to have a mix between exploration and relaxation and our travel agent proposed an itinerary that answered our needs. We got to explore Athens AND unwind on the beautiful Mykonos island. I liked the fact that we got to talk to a live person over the phone to plan this out rather than just buying a packing somewhere. We felt our needs were heard.
